tasks.task_description: Remove Containerization package dependency from Xcode project
Rewrite ContainerService to execute CLI commands
Rewrite ImageService to execute CLI commands
Update ViewModels to use sync service initialization
Update AppConfiguration for CLI path detection
Test CLI execution and output parsing

description: Refactor app to use container CLI wrapper instead of Containerization framework
context: Rewrote both ContainerService and ImageService to execute CLI commands instead of using Containerization framework
Updated all ViewModels to use synchronous service initialization
Updated AppConfiguration with CLI path detection and system status checking
Build succeeds! All code changes complete. Created MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md documenting the changes.
